data.suggestion: Keidran Maren and Keidran Nibbly cat-fighting for Scythe's attention.
Landen ignores Maeve's longing stare at her cup of joe, but finally caves to cuteness and lets Maeve have her first sip of coffee.
Keith as Marty Mcfly and Trace as Doc Brown from back to the future, standing by the delorean.
Vain visions of villainy: a portrait of Prince(ss) Clovis and Seer Brahn
Raine/Rose AU: Cookie bake-off between Raine & Rose vs. Maeve & Adira
Sythe roof running (cyber punk themed)
Adelaide demolishing a tower by lifting it
FemKeith uses her chest bandages to banish Keith to the pocket dimension.
It turns out that Nibbly is a secret agent for an organization of squirrels, and she is reporting to her boss who is the King of the Squirrels
Kathrin puts on a fashion show for more of her outfits, with female Trace, Keith, and/or Mike and Evals as the models.
Boys locker room meme: the girls in their locker room having a normal conversation while the boys have the sickest party ever in the boys locker room
WW2 pinup of Raine as a British sniper (wolf-form).
Young Laura playing on the beach
Red proposes to Raine with an enchanted ring that matches her transformation to him. If Raine is a wolf so is Red.
Twokinds Stargate SG-1 (Trace as O’Neill, Flora as Carter, Keith as Jackson, Natani as Teal’c)
Smug Nibbly Anthro version
Mad scientist Maddie makes the perfect coffee with her loyal assistant Maeve.
Eric tries to buy Keidran kitty Nora
A Tigress noble joins two male human cartographers map out the Tiger territory, similar to Lewis and Sacajawea
Cathleen teaching young Keith how to fight with a spear Western Basitin style
Nibbly has secretly been tending to a bouquet of precious baby squirrelies. Sythe finds out.
"Human" Nora attempts to seduce Flora in an attempt to make Trace jealous.
Keith and Natani embarrassed by Trace and Flora's overly affectionate behavior during a double date.
Raine with a sword in one hand and a Spell in another in a sexy barbarian outfit (wolf form)
Maeve walking across the stage at graduation in cap and gown, and her mother bawling her eyes out
Deltarune! Maddie as Kris, Karen as Susie and Maeve as Ralsei
Total species swap, such as Nora becoming a bird
Laura as Sci-Fi hologram. Ghost from the Net.
Maren as Carmen Sandiego.
Redux of Natani cosplaying as Renamon (Natanimon)
Magpie Reference Sheet
Eric, fed up that no one has requested a ref sheet of him, decides to draw his own ref sheet.
Lady Nora meets Tohru from Miss Kobiyashi's Dragon Maid after Tohru accidently takes a wrong dimensional turn through a rift.
Laura daki.
Reni gets overeager lighting some magical fireworks from her collection for the group, sets off the whole box
Mike and evals (still lost in the city from that one piece) get directions from a pretty Irish setter passing by
Nora and Raine collab on FanFiction, only for Kat and maybe Trace to find it.
Mike (Normal) Reference Sheet
Alternate Universe where Raine lives with Keidran and is mortified when she uncontrollably turns into a human.
Lady Nora tries to show Reni how to properly compose herself as a dragon but gets flustered and falls over when she see’s trace, Reni asks if Nora requires assistance
After Trace wakes from a nightmare about Flora, he holds his sleeping fiancee and unborn child, whispering a promise into her ear: that he'll never let anyone hurt them. Not even himself.
Kat unleashing the power of ban hammer!
Adira reference sheet
Keidran Raine meets Keidran Maren. This time Maren's the uncomfortable and embarrassed one.
Raine and Zen's snapshot at the top of a rollercoaster. One is freaking out, while the other tries to comfort them.
King Crab pinches Flora's bikini bottom!
Meet Me In The Sunlight remake
Suddenly Dragons. Team B finds themselves completely transformed into baby dragons. Reni ends up babysitting.
Clovis has been made a slave and ends up as a model for Eric
Adira Ref sheet
Natani frightened by a thunderstorm is comforted by Keith
Clovis reference sheet
Lady Nora getting struck by karma and forced to act like a dog, to her embarrassment, when a soulswap spell goes wrong.
Natani's Blunt Dating Service 2: Now that Team B is at the manor, Natani barges in and presents a slightly embarrassed Kat to Raine.
The moment after birth of first dragon princess.
Laura’s sister gets her comeuppance
Flora finds a harp in the estate and snaps the strings with her claws. An unhappy Roselyn appears.
Raine and Maren on a daytrip to the Statue of Liberty.
Remake of Keidran Trace 'Sit': Tiger Trace plop on the floor by Flora's sit command.
Keith and Natani at swimming at the beach
In the alt universe where Zen and Natani live on the Basitin islands, young (kids/early teens) Natani and Keith meet. Keith bashfully gives Natani a flower who bashfully accepts it.
Laura establishes her king and crowns herself Empress of all things plush and cuddly.
Under the table, a tiny dragon Nora is crawling into Trace's pants. Above the table, eating dinner, Trace looks alarmed.
Cat Keidran Nora pushes Trace too far. He finally snaps and chains her up in the dungeon – mission accomplished!
What if Laura was Grand Templar instead of Trace?
Evil Kat and Flora tormenting Tiger trace.
While at dinner, Natani tells Raine funny embarrassing stories about Zen, making him visibly flustered and uncomfortable.
Trace Ref Sheet
Keidran Nibbly laying on a bed with her temporary nightwear (like in Magical Mishaps) and in a cute pose.
Trace tickles Flora when she’s feeling bad about her ballooning state. For his efforts, he gets an involuntary tiger foot to the gut
Maren, Sythe (and Nibs) check out the Human Only Bath on their way to the beach after having it recommended to them by Natani & Keith (who did NOT divulge the features).
Noodle dragon Maddie, with bwom for her actual age, reaction from Natani and Kingly snark.
Chimera V. Adelaide: Arm Wrestle For The Crown!
Colin trying to be smooth in an attempt to charm the viewer, but fails to think of a decent line
"Keith's Boobhat" Redux
Young Male!Clovis gets angry when hes mistaken for a wolf girl due to his fox half.
A confused Colin and Sam find themselves in Halfkinds forms, to Sam's utter delight.
Maddie and Maeve playing with Nora's tail, with Nora's reaction.
Maeve, Karen, and Maddie having a sleepover
World War II pin-up Alaric as Colonel Von Strassenburg the hero of operation Valkyrie
Older Maeve and Maddie share their first kiss. Maddie gets extremely flustered afterwards.
Kat makes Sythe new diplomat clothes. Maren secretly likes the look, but feigns indifference
TK characters as Fellowship of the Ring.
Flora and Kat in the “Human Only” bath much to the surprise of ( Human ) Raine and Maren!
Tiger Trace and Keith wear the control collars. Flora sees this and makes them her servants.
Raine and Red (Both in Halfkind forms) share a heartwarming kiss under a waterfall.
Adira gets a bit carried away taste testing a new ale for the tavern. Drunk Adira is drunk.
a sequel to Subtleseed: Natani proposes to Keith in turn, with a traditional basitin betrothal gift
